results.content: No estoy conforme con el curso. Es muy teórico y faltan más ejemplos prácticos. Se queda corto con las técnicas de refactoring. No hay ejercicios. Mucho del código que se muestra contiene errores, e incluso no lo ejecuta.

results.content:
Muy buen material, justo lo que andaba buscando

Como unico detalle, me hubiera gustado que hubieran sido mas explicativos en el video "Python Refactoring Using Conditionales", mostraron la solucion pero no como hacer uso de ella en el codigo original.

results.content: Yes , lets for a change forget all the coding standards , tech jargons etc., and notice his code. His code which he is teaching is indeed nice , compact and easy to understand and debug , so yeah I can follow his approach .
results.content_html: Yes , lets for a change forget all the coding standards , tech jargons etc., and notice his code. His code which he is teaching is indeed nice , compact and easy to understand and debug , so yeah I can follow his approach .

results.content: Very disappointed, no exercises so no hands-on (if that's what I wanted I would have listened to youtube videos about the subject). Presenter rarely run the code to show that after refactor the code still runs as expected. Code contains errors. Never discussed the need to create test cases to guide and protect you during refactoring

results.content: The examples given are on a domain that is not familiar to all programmers. Such as the lead and the customer. A more popular domain should be used.
results.content_html: The examples given are on a domain that is not familiar to all programmers. Such as the lead and the customer. A more popular domain should be used.
